alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 09 at 7:10AM CST until February 13 at 8:10AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Agricultural land along the river is flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 25.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 25.7 Thu 6 am CST 26.4 27.0 26.2 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM CST.
